div.em: Current conditions as of 19 Apr 22:56 pm CDT

div.div: A chance of showers and thunderstorms. Mostly cloudy, with a low around 38. East wind around 5 mph becoming calm after midnight. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New rainfall amounts of less than a tenth of an inch, except higher amounts possible in thunderstorms.

A 10 percent chance of showers before 7am. Partly sunny, then gradually becoming sunny, with a high near 67. Breezy, with a light and variable wind becoming northwest 18 to 23 mph in the morning. Winds could gust as high as 36 mph.
Mostly clear, with a low around 35. Breezy, with a northwest wind 15 to 20 mph becoming light north after midnight. Winds could gust as high as 28 mph.

strong.a: Please sign up for the Grab & Go meals using this form.

p.a:
(Click anywhere on this page)
Grab & go meals start Monday March 30th, 2020. In order to receive this meal,
you must complete this form by 9:30 am the day of the meal.
You can also fill this form out a week at a time.

These meals are for Humphrey Public School children ages 1-18. The pick up times
for meals each day will be 11:30-12:15 with the pick up at the main southeast doors.
No meals will be arranged unless you have filled out this form.
If you have questions, please call 402-923-1230

a.aria-label: Read more about Lunch meal Participation Form 2020
